calculations.name: Final KPI Score
calculations.tableau_expression: [Executive Score]+ IF [Success Flag]="Success" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

calculation_context.Expression: [Executive Score]+ IF [Success Flag]="Success" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

calculated_fields.Success Flag:
IF [Target Status] = "Above Target" AND [Overall Health] = "Excellent"
THEN "Success" ELSE "Try Again" END
calculated_fields.Executive Score:
IF [Final Performnace Label] = "Excellent" THEN [Weighted Score] + 2
ELSE [Weighted Score]
END
calculated_fields.Target Status: IF [Profit vs Target (Uses Profit Margin %)]>0 THEN "Above Target " ELSE "Below Target" END
calculated_fields.Overall Health:
IF [Overall Rating] > 5 AND [Stability Tier] = "Stable"
THEN "Excellent"
ELSEIF [Overall Rating] > 3 THEN "Good"
ELSE "Poor"
END
calculated_fields.Final Performnace Label:
IF [Alert Flag] = "Alert" THEN "Critical"
ELSE [Overall Health]
END
calculated_fields.Priority Flag: IF  [Overall Health]="Excellent " AND  [Priority Segment]="Top Priority " THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
calculated_fields.Overall Rating:
IF [Priority Segment] = "Top Priority" THEN 
    [Order Health Score] + 1
ELSE
    [Order Health Score]
END
calculated_fields.Stability Tier: IF [Revenue Stability]>200 THEN "Stable" ELSEIF  [Revenue Stability] >50 THEN "Moderate" ELSE "Unstable" END
calculated_fields.Alert Flag:
IF [Rank Category ] = "Tier 3" AND [Failure Risk] = "High Risk"
THEN "Alert"
ELSE "Normal"
END
calculated_fields.Priority Segment:
IF [Profit Health] = "Excellent" AND [Profitablity Tier] = "High Margin"
THEN "Top Priority"
ELSE "Normal"
END
calculated_fields.Order Health Score: IF  [Failure Risk]="High Risk" THEN [Final Score]-2 ELSE [Final Score] END
calculated_fields.Failure Risk: IF [Loss Flag]=1 AND  [Discount Tier]="High Discount " THEN "High Risk" ELSE "Low Risk" END
calculated_fields.Final Score: IF  [Discount Tier]="Low Discont" THEN [Performance Code]+ 1 ELSE [Performance Code] END
calculated_fields.Profitablity Tier: IF  [Profit Margin %]>20 THEN "High Margin" ELSEIF [Profit Margin %]>10 THEN "Medium Margin" ELSE "Low Margin" END
calculated_fields.Discount Tier: IF [Discount Health]>0.25 THEN "High Discount" ELSEIF  [Discount Health]>0.10 THEN "Medium Discount" ELSE "Low Discont" END
calculated_fields.Profit Health:
IF [Profit Ratio ] > 0.2 THEN
    IF [Revenue Tier] = "High" THEN "Excellent"
    ELSE "Good" END
ELSE
    IF [Revenue Tier] = "Low" THEN "Poor"
    ELSE "Average"
END END
calculated_fields.Revenue Tier: IF [Net Revenue ]>1000 THEN "High Margin" ELSEIF [Profit Margin %]>10 THEN "Medium Margin" ELSE "Low Margin" END
calculated_fields.Performance Code: IF [Is High Performing ]="Yes" THEN [Quality Score ]+2 ELSE [Quality Score ]-1 END
